snippet: Luis Camarillo, 18, was standing at the rear of a truck that had been loaded with recycled paper when he was struck by the compactor and killed, the police said.
lead_paragraph: Luis Camarillo, 18, was standing at the rear of a truck that had been loaded with recycled paper when he was struck by the compactor and killed, the police said.

headline.seo: Man Is Crushed by Compactor in Brooklyn
headline.main: Worker Is Crushed by Garbage Truck Compactor in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Worker Is Crushed by Garbage Truck Compactor in Brooklyn
